long_description: A tool for everyday cycling, the Topeak X-Tool 10 folding bike tool handles most repairs and is beautifully finished for long-lasting durability. Tools include 2, 3, 4 (2 pieces), 5, 6 and 8mm Allen wrenches and Phillips screwdriver. Comes with a 4mm Allen wrench to tighten itself. Durable engineering-grade plastic body provides excellent gripping surface.
short_description: A tool for everyday cycling, the Topeak X-Tool 10 folding bike tool handles most repairs and is beautifully finished for long-lasting durability.
